website_summaries.verdict: These quick-dry shoes are ready for adventure, in the water and out. Keep a pair of socks handy, though, in case of blisters.
pros: Expanded tread pattern helps keep these water-ready shoes from slipping
Lightweight IMEVA and soft buc upper with breathable perforations
cons: Some kids get blisters when they wear these without socks
Will shrink if you put them in the dryer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Quality. Could've bought two pairs of crocs instead.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were cuter than crocs, which they are; but they are not 1/2 as tough. The trim pieces are just coated in the color & it rubs right off. 2nd image is to show the shoes are new. Really disappointed, we've had them for less than 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. La Pointe

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality plastic...thanks for blisters!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the worst, don’t buy it. It gave my son his first blisters, not even a blister it took all skin off from his both feet. Ordered Native Jefferson right away and retuned these. I was so excited to try this brand for the first time but never again. I am so mad... applying neosporine trying to dry it but afraid also he might get an infection. It’s been two days and he says it hurts, can not stand on his feet properly.
customer_reviews.author: Elif

customer_reviews.title: Blisters!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son got blisters after the 1st wear. I thought they just needed to be broken in, but he gets a new blister each time. The size is correct, so I'm not sure what's causing this. I love other Goplae shoes, but these are just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yellen

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought the size 2 for my 6 year old boy. We like the convenience of Crocs but they always seem to rub his feet wrong. These are the same type of material but a little nicer looking and no complaints about blisters. He doesn't like wearing sandals in the summer because mulch gets in them, but I don't like him to wear sneakers if he's going stomping in creeks and puddles. These are perfect! You can get them wet, hose them off if they're dirty, and wipe clean. And bonus, they come in fun colors. I will buy them again next year.
customer_reviews.author: ebd08

customer_reviews.title: Look out for mismatched sizing
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this negative review to apprise others that they too might find one shoe is too small (or big, I suppose). I bought my son a kids size 10. They are correctly marked 10L & 10R. There is sizing difference but it didn’t jump out at me. It was only my son complaining that one was too small (while the first had growing room) that I recognized they were about a full size different. I have another pair OTW, hoping this was just a defect, or at least hoping to make a pair 😏.
customer_reviews.author: shoppe-a-holick

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortably stiff
customer_reviews.text: We had some plae sneakers that we loved so when I found these, I thought it was a no brainer since the price was right. I’ve forced the kid to use them a few times now and I say forced because he hates them. Summers previous we bought crocs and I thought this would be an nice upgrade but they’re so stiff and the tongue is uncomfortable. My guy isn’t picky, he doesn’t complain about discomfort until it’s too late (blisters, rub spots) but he grumbles every time I pull these out and much more prefers the cheapy fabric/rubber sole water shoes I bought for a quarter of the price of these. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: mike d

customer_reviews.title: Blisters
customer_reviews.text: Love how lightweight these are, that they are easy to get on/off, and that they fit well on my son’s narrow feet. Also like that they don’t stay wet like our Keen sandals. But after an hour of wear, my kiddo had a raw blister on the side of one foot. They would be fine with socks but that kinda defeats the purpose of this particular shoe so these get a thumbs down from me...
customer_reviews.author: S&B

customer_reviews.title: No blisters, fit way better than youth natives
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to Natives! I’ve loved buying my kids Natives in the past, but once my son was in the youth sizes, they were way too big and flopped off the back of his heel constantly. Switched to these bc you can get them nice and snug. He can run around the neighborhood as well as he can in tennis shoes - without fear of them getting wet or stinky. No issues with blisters either! He loves them! I’d stick with Natives for 4 & under bc they fit well in the smaller sizes and preschoolers can put them on themselves. But if Natives don’t work, a great option!
customer_reviews.author: LTS

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are such a great summer shoe! I was afraid of blisters but we just had them wear them a little bit at a time for the first week or two and now they can wear them all day. Perfect for lakes, creeks, errands, whatever. The only downside is the tabs can be pulled out very easily which makes me scared they will get lost.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Fits wide, tall, chunky feet
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hard time finding shoes wide and tall enough for my 3yr old...especially water shoes when they are wet. These shoes fit awesome! The sides and tongue open really wide. My son loved them immediately and wanted to wear them all the time. I’m taking off a star for two reasons. The white edging at the toes wore off almost immediately because my son uses his toes to stop his balance bike. They also gave him a blister on the side of one foot. Since he still wanted to wear them, he wore a bandaid and sock with the one shoe for about 10 days until it healed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Menken

customer_reviews.title: These shoes lasted two weeks and broke
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these! My son wore these for two weeks and the strap ripped right off. Now it is impossible to secure them on his foot. They look like he has been wearing them for two years, not two weeks, being worn at the toe as well. Very poor quality. I wrote to the company to ask them to make it right as a first time customer and never heard back. There are more options out there. Plae’s loss. I’m a pretty loyal customer once I like a product and willing to keep buying Plae shoes if they made it right. Not a good way to do business on their part.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Tongue is too high; higher than pictured
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and wanted to love these, but the tongue comes up too high on the ankle, causing sharp discomfort for the child when walking. The picture shows the tongue flush with the shoe, but it came up higher than the top of the surrounding shoe. Took my 3.5 year old, who loves everything and is easy going, for a walk and I didn’t make it around the block without them crying from ankle pain. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for narrow kid feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for both myself and my son as I have small feet. My 6 year old, who has neither wide nor narrow feet, put them on and immediately took them off saying their were uncomfortable. When I tried my pair later I found these run quite narrow and were a good fit on my narrow small feet. However, the velcro style is meant for kids and I decided it looked too juvenile for me. We returned both pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I thought I ordered...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t actually put them on my child yet they are for next summer but the photos need to be changed in the displays of shoes because the pair I chose bright green show two straps and my pair only had one. Please change your photos so the shoes are true to picture. My fault I didn’t read below where is specified some sizes have one strap!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and narrow
customer_reviews.text: I have bought lots of other Plae styles (currently we own the Chloe and Sam) for my kid, but this one isn’t up to their normal standards. Both the sole and the upper are very stiff and don’t allow natural foot motion. Not enough toe room for even an average-width foot either. I’m returning both pairs and we won’t try this style again.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest mama

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: The color looks much brighter in person. Its very bright orangey pink color. My daughter complains that they rub on the sides of her feet. They are easy for a young child to put on and they are good for the beach or pool but I wouldn’t have my child wear them to do a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My son is rough and wild but loves water play. These shoes are durable and easy to clean. They are great for water and mud play but still protecting toes. They have great traction so no worries of slipping on wet splash pad floored. The shoe is sturdy and they are easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Hold up great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these again for the second year in a row. I like these more than the native shoes. They seem more comfortable and also have a strap to actually open the shoe to be able to put it on instead of trying to jam their feet in them. We’ll be sticking with these plae shoes for our warmer months!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Siegle

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for kids
customer_reviews.text: Taking the kids out west to hike this summer. Wanted a shoe that would be comfy and could get wet. We haven’t taken our trip yet, but in the week we’ve had the kids love them. We went canoeing and hiking close to home and they worked great. Kids play in the backyard with them. I debated about getting these, but I’m already glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: R. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Sandals that are not to be worn without socks. If you skip the socks, blisters are guaranteed. Also, that plastic makes the feet sweat pretty bad
customer_reviews.author: Dara D

customer_reviews.title: Caution these shoes will warp in the sun
customer_reviews.text: So bummed that after owning these only a few weeks, they were left outside at the preschool and warped (melted) in the hot sun. I had this same issue with Native Brand. These shoes also gave my son really bad blisters. He hated putting them on. I generally love Plae brand but these were a total fail. The only pro for this shoe is that they are better looking than most.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Blisters blisters blisters.
customer_reviews.text: Gave my kids terrible blisters on the 2nd wear. My daughter got 2 blisters and my son got 3, one even on the bottom of his heel. Love the look but not worth the deep blisters and pain, obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Gave toddler blisters
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and my toddler was excited to get them, but the heel was too tough and kept giving him blisters and it became too painful. He had stopped wearing them even though they still fit. He’s worn them with socks and it helped with blisters but not cute.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Quint

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: We are no strangers to Plae shoes. I was in search of a shoe for a trip to the beach, and these were excellent. No blisters, even after plodding through sand and water. They run a little larger than your typical plae shoe, as my son is normally a 12 1/2, but the 12 was perfect. Plae shoes naturally come with a wide toe cage, so no worries if your child has wide and/or chubby feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Folz

customer_reviews.title: Wear out fast
customer_reviews.text: These fit my fat footed kid great, but he’s had them less than a month and the white part on the toe is already wearing off. He wears them 1-2 times a week so unimpressed. They’re still functional but look bad. Not great for brand marketing.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love washable shoes?
customer_reviews.text: These shoes always run a bit big for us by about a half size but they’re manageable. My son has skinny tiny feet and these are the best outdoor summer shoes for him.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Kids can easily put on
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. Easy to put on the tongue comes all the way out so a foot can drop right in. Easy to clean just a quick wipe with a magic eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Derek V.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during winter sales because I thought I was getting a good deal (though see they are still $15 even now) and thus can't even return this- first time wearing, the strap bit fell off. These are junk. I'll stick to natives.
customer_reviews.author: w/KiddosInManhattan

customer_reviews.title: Seem good
customer_reviews.text: My son has worn these a few times around the house to get use to them since other reviews have mentioned blisters. He said that he likes them. Bought them for a trip to FL.
customer_reviews.author: ALMB

customer_reviews.title: my son are in love with these
customer_reviews.text: my son are in love with these... they are slimmer and less bulky than crocs so it's safer/child won't trip over their own feet. The velcro straps are nice and long enough so even if your child has wide feet, the strap is long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Meimei

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and so far lasting through tough play! We love our plae shoes and are very loyal to the brand for their quality, comfort and durability! Will update if anything changes...
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: He lost one of the straps at Camp though and of course they don’t sell straps individually 😾 And now that one shoe is too loose to be worn Oh well - they are very cool and comfortable (just keep an eye on those straps)
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He lost one of the straps at Camp though and of course they don’t sell straps individually 😾 And now that one shoe is too loose to be worn Oh well - they are very cool and comfortable (just keep an eye on those straps)
customer_reviews.author: Lelieth Toppin

customer_reviews.title: Better than crocs, but not minimalist footwear.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a land/water shoe that hoses off or a croc alternative then this is a great option. I was expecting something a bit more flexible and minimalistic so it didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 3 year old son. Very easy to put on and wash. Can be worn with socks or without.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny A.

customer_reviews.title: No thanks.
customer_reviews.text: The tongue in this shoe rubs my sons feet. He had average width feet. Don’t recommend. Natives are so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Steck_

customer_reviews.title: Good but runs a bit smaller than normal plae shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits a bit smaller than other plae shoes and we have bought at least 8-10 pair for my 3 boys.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Arce

customer_reviews.title: Water - Dirt - Play Approved !
customer_reviews.text: I think these shoes run pretty long but narrow. My daughter has a narrow foot and these are great for her. I love that I can scrub them with dish soap and clean them in the summer! The perfect water shoe that doesn’t fall off when wet!
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Go to Summer shoe for my son
customer_reviews.text: This is the second summer I purchased these for my son. In the past he couldn't fit into the Native's b/c his foot was too "square" so I found these and they fit great without pinching. The strap keeps them secure on his feet and plastic design could take a beating. Great summer shoe for kids!
customer_reviews.author: McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We love this style shoe - our kids can take on and off themselves. You can use for water or activities as it dries super quick. Def worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kara & Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle to find shoes to fit my son's wide feet but these were perfect! They're similar to a croc material so they clean and dry very quickly. They'll be perfect for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The picture makes them look like a coral
customer_reviews.text: These are florescent orange. The picture makes them look like a coral, pinky color. I was shocked when we got them - my daughter looks like a little construction worker wearing them. Other than the obnoxious color, they're durable, comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SB in Colo

customer_reviews.title: Best water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these and so do I. They are easy for her to put on herself and comfortable even when wet. I like that they are easy to wash and quick to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Momofthree

customer_reviews.title: Great for any width!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! They fit my 2 y/o who wears a 9 in new balance perfect. They do not rub, and are perfect. My son wears a wide/ xwide normally too and these work!
customer_reviews.author: Boy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for water or just around town
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! My son wears them in the water or just around town. No rubbing without socks. he wears an 8 toddler and that's what I ordered and they fit well with a little room to grow
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cox

customer_reviews.title: Not flexible
customer_reviews.text: These are way to stiff. Hard plastic like. Don’t recommend. I returned them. Can’t imagine these being comfortable on a foot.
customer_reviews.author: Maycha

customer_reviews.title: Kids both love these!
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids have a pair after ruining so many canvas shoes this summer. So far they’ve held up wonderfully and the kids even run in them.
customer_reviews.author: Rian

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. Comfortable, durable and great fir wearing to the pool or beach. Very stylish, too.
customer_reviews.author: glitzalicious

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 3 year old and his wide feet! Easy to put on and they aren’t too tight on the tops of his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Bad blisters
customer_reviews.text: At first seemed like a good fit and they were super easy for my 3 year old to get on and off by himself. But after one wear for a long walk, he got a huge blister on each foot.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: They look so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love them! She is almost a size 8 so she hasn't wore them out and about yet but they will be perfect for her this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Holt

customer_reviews.title: Great look and cool(temperature ;) ) wear for summer
customer_reviews.text: They look awesome and are light and airy. Great alternative to some of the expensive airy sneakers Although after the first wear my son complained of a blister i'm hoping a few more wears with socks will help break them in and they wont rub!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 and the 1 fits perfect. I also bought a 10 for my other ...
customer_reviews.text: My little guy wears a 1.5 and the 1 fits perfect. I also bought a 10 for my other son who is a true 10.5. They both fit great with a little room to grow. We used to have Natives but they would slip off their hills. The velcro straps on these make that not a problem. They are easy to get on and off and super comfortable they say. Good find!
customer_reviews.author: April Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We love these for summer and use in water! They provide protection and ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke T.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: These held up great with our active 3 year old all summer. Great for going from the pool to the park. The closed toes were a huge plus at the playground and while riding bikes/scooters to protect our kiddos toes. No worries about tripping over the front of the shoe. These were wet here and there all summer and no smell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go get your green shoes.
customer_reviews.text: With this brand I always get a size smaller than normal shoes. My daughter loves and lives in these shoes. She's had two pairs now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs a size small
customer_reviews.text: Runs a size small. The 11 was the same size as my son’s 10s. I’m annoyed because I bought these on sale to wear next year and now we can’t.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McElmury

customer_reviews.title: Great Summer shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are not canvas like his other Plae shoes. These are rubber... similar to Crocs material, but thinner and flexible. Great for summer with perforations. It is easy for my son to put on and off with Velcro closures. He really likes them. Since we live in hot climate these will take him into the school year.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes and says they are super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: vanessa krishnamachari

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for kids. Can be worn with socks or bare feet, and super easy to clean. We have 4 pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Raley

customer_reviews.title: My picky son really liked them. Really easy to put on and look ...
customer_reviews.text: My picky son really liked them. Really easy to put on and look nicer than crocs but with the same ease.
customer_reviews.author: Zxe1103

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. My son loves them to play outside. Great during bathroom trainning since they are easy to clean and dry if they get wet. Have had them for many months. Soon I will order next size.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Cuprill

customer_reviews.title: Super small
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because they were too small and I ordered a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy!  No blisters here!
customer_reviews.text: We love Mimos and Plae! The hold up so well and rinse out early. The color gray goes with everything. My son asks for his Mimo shoes daily.
customer_reviews.author: W. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is my priority
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. These are our first Plae purchase. Will buy again. Great quality. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cause blisters like some water shoes
customer_reviews.text: We really like these. Quality material & withstands my 3.5 year old playing in them
customer_reviews.author: Megan H

customer_reviews.title: Best for small feet
customer_reviews.text: Not for toddler with chubby feet, my daughter said it bothered her and had to return
customer_reviews.author: Michu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Plae shoes. I had to order a size larger in these, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made I think crocs are better quality the plastic is hard I’m sending back over price too I think this should be cost 5 dollars
customer_reviews.author: AbigailDiaz

customer_reviews.title: Run Big
customer_reviews.text: These are great, but they run slightly big. So, they may rub your kids feet.
customer_reviews.author: LoveShackBaby

customer_reviews.title: These are terrible! They gave my toddler bleeding blisters after the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible! They gave my toddler bleeding blisters after the first day- also they are glued together and you can literally see all the glue - super cheap with a high price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: We buy these shoes every year. They are the perfect summer sneaker/sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are try to size and super cute! Great for water or wear with socks.
customer_reviews.author: kal0818

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible cheap shoe that broke after a little over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie D

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these my daughter wears them spring and summer without rash when wet! Perfect for beach and river trips! Which we do often!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dunnam

customer_reviews.title: Not for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Felt like a shell of a shoe. They came off easily and there was no lining to keep the back from rubbing. Easy to wipe off but no real support. I much prefer stride rite phibians over these.
customer_reviews.author: ohkay

customer_reviews.title: Versatile pair
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t like keeping up with too many pairs this will be your go to sandals come summer! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MyPenNameIsPenName

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, perfect for summer, getting wet and keeping clean. My son is picky about shoes/sandals and loves this pair. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: betsy long

customer_reviews.title: Adorable shoes, great for water, but blisters result
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Rubbed blisters on daughters foot around ankle sides
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.text: We previously owned Natives and they did not work well for my little boy's high arches. He can easily fit his feet into these Plae shoes. He has worn them daily for over a month and they are in excellent condition still - super easy to clean and comfy for him to run around in the hot summertime!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My son is over the moon with these shoes and we love them as well!
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Good for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: She loves to run, jump, and get wet with this sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: AnaE  P.T.

customer_reviews.title: Blister City
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because they look nice, but left my son with 4 blisters on each foot within a few hours of wear at the pool. Won’t be wearing as a water shoe again, which was the whole point of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: dirty and wet every day
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son to wear to camp. He comes home with them sandy, dirty and wet every day, all I do is rinse them off and let them dry for the next day! They are also super easy to put on!
customer_reviews.author: Skyelar Haith

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: This Is our fourth pair of the plae shoes. They are great water shoes and my son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes, but my toddler said the back rubbed his heel before I could even velcro them. They do seem to run very narrow in the heel. I would try them again as he grows just because I like the design so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Hagood

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect - my son wears these all the time and we get so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: lexieb143

customer_reviews.title: Cause blisters
customer_reviews.text: I tried two different sizes for my 5 year old boy. Both caused blisters the first day wearing them. I should have read all previous reviews bc I now see others have had this problem. Pros: Cute, lightweight shoe Cons: Cause bad blisters
customer_reviews.author: Josh McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find a comfortable water/summer shoe other than Crocs. These were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: A warm weather favorite
customer_reviews.text: The white around the toe area rubbed off only after a few wears. Other than that, they are great, versatile warm weather shoes for active kids.
customer_reviews.author: ShopgalNEPA

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight ad easy
customer_reviews.text: My son could wear them with his smo’s or without
customer_reviews.author: kerri

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected, color was as pictured. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ShanSalterWrites

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they looks very confy and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was somewhat small, I should of order a bigger size. My kid is already complaining on his foot so I decided to put them aside. I just cant return them since he already use them I guess. Other than that they looks very confy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son wears them everywhere! Perfect for an active 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on! My 3 1/2 year old wears these daily and has not had a blister or discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on! My 3 1/2 year old wears these daily and has not had a blister or discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoe, but after a few hours of my 3 year old wearing them, she already had blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised on this website
customer_reviews.text: The picture above has two straps but the product delivered had one. Better to buy from the original product website.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: There is one strap, not two. And although it’s called coral, it’s fluorescent pink. With a coral strap. The girl still likes them so we’ll keep them, but they are nothing like the description or picture.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell hayes

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous shoe for my busy 2YO
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe! My son has a wide foot and he wears a size larger than his typical wide shoe and he LOVES the shoe. He can even put them on himself. The shoes even have left and right labeled on the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for my 7 year old at the pool, at the beach, or just to run around in.
customer_reviews.text: Pool, beach and running around outside. Doesn’t leave marks on my son and doesn’t bother him not wearing socks. Love this shoe even more than Crocs! So does my son!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but blisters
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes and versatile. But my son isn't able to wear them without socks or he gets blisters on his heels every time. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenine Wong

product_meta.title: plae Girls' Mimo Sneaker, Coralin, 10 M US Toddler
product_meta.description: Mimi - this aquatic kid is the first to jump in at the sight of any body of water
feature_bullets: Sizes 8, 9 and 10 have ONE tab only
Lower holes filled in to avoid debris
